name: Public Fields naming convention - case and character set control
description: Names of Public Fields should start with an uppercase character and should not include any underscore
output:
This report lists all the Public Fields (that are not const) with names not starting with an uppercase letter or having an underscore.
It provides the following information: Field full name
rationale: For readability aspects, naming conventions must be respected
remediation: Change name according to the naming convention
